name: Risky Robots
description:
This is a game about robots where you can play with up to 4 players.

It has all kinds of guns and, if you have some experience coding, you can change a bunch of things about the guns. From making them overpowered to making them do nothing at all.

If you want to mod it there's a detailed explanation in it's Github repository (https://github.com/ProfessorQu/Risky-Robots)
